EmailTemplate.description: Adaptive Insights Partner Community (this is for Partner prospects who are approved to be partners and gain access
EmailTemplate.name: 2A. Partner Prospect Community Welcome Email - Custom Wrap
EmailTemplate.subject: Adaptive Insights Partner Community Registration
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Receiving_User.FirstName},
Welcome to the Adaptive Insights Partner Community!
Here are your next steps: 1. Your user name is {!Receiving_User.Username} and please click here to set your password {!Community_Url} 2. Please review the Partner Program Guides and Terms and Conditions. 3. You will receive a DocuSign notification shortly to review and sign the partnership agreement. 4. Donâ€™t forget to bookmark the Community: https://partnerbox-partners.cs61.force.com
If need any assistance, please connect with us at partners@adaptiveinsights.com
The Adaptive Insights Channel Team
